articles.title: The colloidal stability of albumin-based drug delivery systems has a profound effect on tumoricidal activity.
articles.summary: Researchers developed improved albumin-based nanoparticles for paclitaxel delivery, enhancing colloidal stability and reducing premature drug release in tumor models.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
